Information on sustainable transportation of waste should be submitted as part of the planning application, alongside details of reuse and recycling of waste arising during the construction phase in line with Policy RW1 (see part 7). 20.42 Developments providing additional waste management capacity will be encouraged to co-locate with existing waste facilities and other REUSE, RECYCLING AND WASTE
